sourceMeaningMnemonic: Below the <radical>canopy</radical> of <radical>tree</radical>s is a <radical>hand</radical>. The hand is just there to <kanji>chafe</kanji> against the trees.
meaningInfo: There's a hand just chafing against some trees. That's... interesting.
readingMnemonic: As the hand <kanji>chafe</kanji>s on the trees, it says <reading>ma</reading>ma (<ja>ま</ja>), mama.
readingInfo: This is the hand of a child looking for its mama. And, it chafes against trees to try and find the warm, soft touch of its mama. Instead, it only finds rough bark, so it continues its chafing.
